note.note-paragraph: In this subclass non-limiting references (in the sense of paragraph 39 of the Guide to the IPC) may still be displayed in the scheme.

title-part.text: exchangeably attached to underbodices, drawers, or the like
False shirt-fronts, e.g. dickeys, with or without attached collars

CPC-specific-text.text: Methods or devices for their manufacture

reference.text: fold-line formings for collars or cuffs A41B5/00; folding collar or cuff edges while manufacturing A41H33/00

title-part.text: with supports for neckties or cravats
Fold-line formings for collars or cuffs

reference.text: folding collar or cuff edges while manufacturing A41H33/00
A41B1/00, A41B3/00 take precedence; cuff links A44B5/00

title-part.text: Fastening cuffs to the sleeves of jackets

reference.text: specially adapted for men A41B9/02; specially adapted for ladies A41B9/04

CPC-specific-text.text: with thong, tonga or string shape
with releasable connection between crotch and front part

title-part.text: Drawers or underpants for men, with or without inserted crotch or seat parts
Knickers for ladies, with or without inserted crotch or seat parts

reference.text: combined with swabs or absorbent pads or specially adapted for supporting them A61F13/15

title-part.text: Waistbands forming part of the undergarments
Shoulder-straps forming part of the undergarments

reference.text: elastic stockings for curative purposes A61F13/08
devices for keeping articles together during laundering D06F95/008

CPC-specific-text.text: Hosiery with intermediate sections of different elasticity
Hosiery made essentially of a multi-ply construction
Hosiery with an added sole, e.g. sole made of rubber or leather

reference.text: to be put in footwear A43B23/28

title-part.text: Means at the upper end to keep the stockings up

CPC-specific-text.text: Elastic or flexible yarns knitted into the upper end
Elastic or flexible bands attached at the upper end
Panti-hose made of two separated stockings

reference.text: babies' napkins or holders therefor A61F13/15

CPC-specific-text.text: ; patients' garments specially adapted for babies A41D13/1272

reference.text: combined with swabs or absorbent pads or specially adapted for supporting them A61F13/15

CPC-specific-text.text: with fastening means for attachment to tray or table

title-part.text: Selection of special materials for underwear
Details of underwear, baby linen or handkerchiefs
Functions or special features of underwear, baby linen or handkerchiefs
Breathability, i.e. being vapour permeable and waterproof
Shaping the contour of the body or adjusting the figure
from the top of a stack of removable layers
with the body of the user
Materials for underwear, baby linen or handkerchiefs
